amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute prohibits burial in Arlington National Cemetary or a State veterans cemetary to anyone convicted of a Federal capital crime or any State capital crime involving the loss of one or more lives.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stump amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
